ComicInfo.Summary:
Momentous news changes everything for the pilots on Iwo Jima, and a dangerous new program of missions soon brings heavy casualties. With the end of the war apparently in sight, each man needs his luck to last just that little bit longer- but with the enemy determined to fight to the finish, who will be left when the guns fall silent? The final part of The Tokyo Club, by Garth Ennis and Tomas Aira.Available with Regular, Wraparound, Good Girl Nose Art,& Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Covers by Thomas Aria.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tomas Aira | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Tomas Aira | 2 | GGNA | Good Girl Nose Art Cover | Matt Martin | 3 | RI | 1:3 Battle Damage Retailer Incentive Cover | Matt Martin | 4 |
